[00:00.00]Thug Love (Explicit) - A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie
[00:03.34]Lyrics by：Artist Dubose/London Holmes/Shaun Thomas/Matthew Spatola
[00:06.68]It's crazy you're still pretty when you cry
[00:09.17]We got London on the track
[00:10.34]She want that thug love yeah
[00:12.45]But this ain't no f**king love song
[00:15.01]It's crazy you're still pretty when you cry
[00:17.28]Push your panty strings over to the side
[00:20.21]Gon' wake up and hit it why you got your thong on yeah
[00:23.11]You tellin' me that you want thug love
[00:25.63]But you don't even kiss me when we m**ing l**e
[00:28.18]And that's how I knew that you was a dog
[00:32.01]I cannot blame you
[00:33.91]I can't even lie I was the same too
[00:36.68]I might be the reason yeah I changed you
[00:39.73]Girl I never meant to play you
[00:42.87]Now you don't trust n***as
[00:43.94]Trust n***as
[00:45.29]The same way I don't trust b***hes
[00:46.61]Trust b***hes
[00:47.60]I ain't gon' lie I was a dog n***a
[00:49.64]Dog
[00:50.26]A thug n***a with a heart
[00:51.85]A thug n***a with a heart
[00:59.26]N***as finna send shots tryna get even
[01:02.10]Headshot leave you like a vegetable with needles yeah
[01:04.71]Rattin' that's gon' make them n***as run up on your people yeah yeah
[01:07.75]Can't be eatin' on no cheese that's it n***a nah
[01:10.13]I just wanna be a rock star like The Beatles
[01:12.82]I ain't no f**king stuntman Evel Knievel
[01:15.45]But I can get you stuck man f**k is you thinking n***a
[01:18.19]Shooting like a Jumpman 23 'em yeah yeah
[01:21.29]Okay yeah that's Boogie in your nightmares
[01:23.62]Yeah okay I used to bust juggs with my right hand
[01:26.30]Yeah okay I used to bag it up with my left hand
[01:28.90]To this day I never read the Bible so I might sin yeah
[01:32.03]Okay yeah that's Boogie in your nightmares
[01:34.37]I ain't wanna be a pain never do it right yeah
[01:37.09]I just hope my daughter never meet a n***a like me
[01:40.13]'Cause I swear I already know that n***a's grimy
[01:42.81]Yeah that's how I feel n***a
[01:44.92]I f**ked a lot of n***as' b***hes and they still with 'em
[01:47.41]And all the n***as that's with me they was there since lil' n***as
[01:50.23]And they the type to go catch a body and not tell n***as
[01:53.83]But it's so hard to tell though
[01:56.58]I just hope you never tell though yeah yeah
[01:58.98]Ah ah just hold it down yo yeah yeah
[02:01.75]Ah ah stick to the d**n code yeah yeah
[02:04.32]I cheated on my girl so she want
[02:06.95]All of all of my passcodes
[02:09.19]I was a a*shole I made up time for her
[02:11.75]Bought her Louis Vuitton Chanel and Tom Ford yeah
[02:15.62]But you say you want thug love
[02:17.25]Say you want thug love
[02:18.27]But this ain't no f**king love song yeah yeah
[02:20.20]Ain't no f**kin' love song
[02:20.85]Ah ah pretty when you cry ah
[02:22.30]Pretty when you cry
[02:22.84]Pullin' on your panty strings put 'em to the side oh
[02:25.18]Wake up hit it while you still got your thong on yeah nah nah
[02:28.53]While you got your thong on
[02:29.32]You say you want thug love you don't
[02:30.85]You want thug love
[02:31.26]Even kiss me when we m**e l**e oh yeah yeah
[02:33.55]Kiss me when we m**e l**e
[02:34.29]You say that I'm a dog oh
[02:38.32]But you don't even kiss when we m**e l**e oh
data.trans:
[ti:Thug Love (Explicit)]
[ar:A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie]
[al:Artist 2.0 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.34]//
[00:06.68]难以置信 你哭的时候都那么美
[00:09.17]London on da Track制作
[00:10.34]她想要暴徒的爱
[00:12.45]但这不是情歌
[00:15.01]难以置信 你哭的时候都那么美
[00:17.28]一举一动都那么撩人
[00:20.21]一觉醒来 快活一场 为何你穿得那么性感
[00:23.11]你说你想要暴徒的爱
[00:25.63]但当我们缠绵时 你都不肯吻我
[00:28.18]那时候我就知道了 你就是个无赖
[00:32.01]我不能怪你
[00:33.91]我不能说谎 我也和你一样
[00:36.68]或许是我的原因 我改变了你
[00:39.73]姑娘 我从来都没打算玩弄你
[00:42.87]现在你不再相信男人
[00:43.94]相信男人
[00:45.29]和我不相信女人是一样的
[00:46.61]相信女人
[00:47.60]我不会说谎 我也是个无赖
[00:49.64]无赖
[00:50.26]一个有良心的恶棍
[00:51.85]一个有良心的恶棍
[00:59.26]有些人会攻击我 想要找点平衡
[01:02.10]一枪爆头 让你变成植物人 全身插着针
[01:04.71]叛变 会让那些人找上门
[01:07.75]不能吃那种东西 那是非法的
[01:10.13]我只想做个摇滚明星 就像披头士
[01:12.82]我不是Evel Knievel那样的特技表演者
[01:15.45]但我可以让你寸步难行 朋友 你在想什么
[01:18.19]开枪毫不犹豫 弹无虚发 无人可逃
[01:21.29]我就是你的梦魇
[01:23.62]以前我喜欢用右手持枪
[01:26.30]以前我喜欢用左手拿钱
[01:28.90]到今天 我从没读过圣经 所以我可能会犯罪
[01:32.03]我就是你的梦魇
[01:34.37]我不想伤害别人 却总是控制不住
[01:37.09]我只希望我的女儿不要遇到我这样的男人
[01:40.13]因为我发誓 我已经知道那个男人很狡诈
[01:42.81]那就我的感受 兄弟
[01:44.92]我勾搭了很多人的女友 他们依然没分手
[01:47.41]跟我在一起的兄弟 从小到大都在一起
[01:50.23]他们会为我保守秘密 绝对守口如瓶
[01:53.83]但这种事情也很难分辨
[01:56.58]我只希望你永远不要揭发我
[01:58.98]管好自己的嘴
[02:01.75]坚持原则
[02:04.32]我欺骗了我的女友 所以她想要
[02:06.95]知道我所有的密码
[02:09.19]我曾是个混蛋 我现在为她腾出了时间
[02:11.75]给她买LV 香奈儿 还有Tom Ford
[02:15.62]但你说你想要暴徒的爱
[02:17.25]说你想要暴徒的爱
[02:18.27]但这不是情歌
[02:20.20]不是情歌
[02:20.85]你哭的时候也很美
[02:22.30]哭的时候也很美
[02:22.84]一举一动都那么撩人
[02:25.18]一觉醒来 快活一场 为何你穿得那么性感
[02:28.53]你穿得好性感
[02:29.32]你说你想要暴徒的爱 你不是真心的
[02:30.85]你想要暴徒的爱
[02:31.26]缠绵的时候都不肯吻我
[02:33.55]缠绵的时候吻我
[02:34.29]你说我是个无赖
[02:38.32]但你在我们缠绵的时候 都不肯吻我
